xml.data:
Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.3 Nikkhepakaṇḍa » 2.3.2 Dukanikkhepa » 2.3.2.12 Kilesagocchaka
2.3.2.12.4 Kilesasampayuttaduka
Niddesa
Nikkhepakaṇḍa
Dukanikkhepa
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesasampayuttaduka
1251.
1950Katame dhammā kilesasampayuttā? Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā vedanākkhandho…pe…  viññāṇakkhandho—  ime dhammā kilesasampayuttā.
1252.
1951Katame dhammā kilesavippayuttā? Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā vedanākkhandho…pe…  viññāṇakkhandho; sabbañca rūpaṃ, asaṅkhatā ca dhātu—  ime dhammā kilesavippayuttā.
<< 2.3.2.12.3 Saṃkiliṭṭhadukaup2.3.2.12.5 Kilesasaṃkilesikaduka >>
